Good Skin Md Smoothing Facial Serum

Brand: GOODSKIN

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER, DIMETHICONE, NIACINAMIDE, GLYCERIN, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE*, PANTHENOL**, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, POLYSORBATE 20, LAURETH-4, LAURETH-7, DISODIUM EDTA, POLYACRYLAMIDE, DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, PHENOXYETHANOL

Ingredient concerns: HIGH
dient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
